posts.post_title: WTB: T206 HOFer with Carolina Brights or AB 350 Frame
posts.post_content:
Looking for the above cards if anyone has one to sell.  Also looking for a Lajoie bat (any back) in SGC 30-50.  

Please email me at [url]dreis114@hotmail.com[/url]

David R.

I'd have to check but I may have a McGinnity American Beauty 350 with frameline that I would consider trading or possibly selling (I have listed as good on my spreadsheet).  Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] if you have interest.
Mike
